data.actual_result: It fades out in the corners.
data.expected_result: It should have a normal border.
data.short_description: In Light Theme, the message context menu has faded-out borders.
data.steps_to_repro: - 1. Switch from Dark Theme to Light Theme. - 2. Click the "3 dots" button in any message. - 3. Look in the context menu.
